import { Button } from "components/button"; import { Field } from "components/field"; import ImageUpload from "components/image/ImageUpload"; import { Input } from "components/input"; import { Label } from "components/label"; import DashboardHeading from "module/dashboard/DashboardHeading"; import React from "react"; import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; const UserProfile = () => { const { control } = useForm({ mode: "onChange", }); return (
); }; export default UserProfile;
